segments.text: I'm really worried about that stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, reaching into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears to be tilting backward, almost ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see him toppling over with the jar in his hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an accident just waiting to happen at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of breaking glass would surely get the woman's attention then.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a simple kitchen, but full of unseen dangers right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below seems oblivious to the immediate risk of him falling on her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a miracle they haven't lost balance yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a close call this could turn into very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR
